description:
Open source 2FA authenticator, with end-to-end encrypted backups


- Auth minor improvements & bug fixes by @ua741 in #3475
- Add altName back to T-Mobile icon that was previously removed from JSON by @casualsailo in #3465
- Enable l10n for Vietnamese, Arabic, Greek, & Slovak by @ua741 in #3476
- Add show notes for mobile and desktop menu by @prateekmedia in #3451
- Fix x64 installer on ARM64 Windows by @omove in #3502
- Add Wargaming icon by @sv3nnie in #3529
- New translations by @github-actions in #3534
- Update dependencies for iOS by @prateekmedia in #3577
- Show hidden window when user clicks on the dock [macOS] by @tmikus in #3582
- Bump versions in Podfile.lock [macOS] by @prateekmedia in #3583
- Auth lockscreen fixes by @AmanRajSinghMourya in #3545
- Add installation instructions for Auth by @vishnukvmd in #3605
- Add Obtainium links to docs by @Hamster45105 in #3642
- Remove `win_http_client.dart` [Windows] by @prateekmedia in #3578
- Add custom icons for Simplicity, RealMe, and PBTech by @wiki-Bird in #3549
- Improvements to the Auth FAQs by @jake-anto in #3682
- Added Logos & Added altName by @LauShyO in #3482
- Fix Alt names not being formatted when processing by @Choromanski in #3516
- Fix Don't use GNOME header bar outside of GNOME by @Merrit in #3688
- Updated icons for dark/light modes by @cgmccurdy in #3535
- Fix Generic icon on Wayland sessions [Linux] by @Merrit in #3737
- Bugfix Auth icons with period by @Choromanski in #3559
- Fix formatting in `custom_icons` by @prateekmedia in #3773
- Fix detection of default locale [Mobile/Auth] by @ua741 in #3819
- Update `custom-icons.json` for impact.com by @SaijoGeorge in #3820
- Improve packaging and DB path by @prateekmedia in #3334
- Add new icons by @LeGenDaRy15PT in #3776
- Fix case insensitive rename by @mnvr in #3871
- Add Icon for DigiFinex.com by @zDqrK404 in #3858
- Add icons for Carta.com, KnownHost.com, TRowePrice.com by @alexrirak in #3908
- Fixed spelling mistake for Ubiquiti SSO in Custom Icons by @KingLuc12 in #3877
- Add new icons by @schipht in #3854
- Bump version v4.1.0 by @ua741 in #3940
